name: Construction of ships by Hagoth
description: Hagoth, an exceedingly curious man, built a large ship on the borders of the land Bountiful, by the land Desolation, and launched it into the west sea, by the narrow neck which led into the land northward.

location.name: Land Bountiful
location.description: On the borders of the land Bountiful, by the land Desolation.
